      • ApkWorkerLegacy

        public ApkWorkerLegacy(ArrayList<File> apkList,
                       LoggerPan logPan,
                       File tempFolder,
                       boolean doSign,
                       boolean doZipalign)
        the constructor of a Legacy apk deodexer
        Parameters:
        apkList - : list of apks to be deodexed
        logPan - : a LoggerPan in which it will log all operations
        tempFolder - : the tempFolder that will be used for scratch Note : make sure this folder is only used by this instance to avoid any conflicts
        doSign - : if true the apk will be resigned
        doZipalign - : if true the apk will be zipaligned

      • deodexApk

        private boolean deodexApk(ApkLegacy apk)
        will make a serie of actions to deodex the parameter File apk will return true only if all tasks are successful all the failed tasks will be sent to the logger
        Parameters:
        apk -
        Returns:
        true only if the apk was deodexed
